de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class AbstractKMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceBasedAlgorithm<NumberVector<?,?>,D,Clustering<MeanModel<V>>>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeans<V,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    D - Distance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, Parameterizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KMeansLloyd, KMeansMacQueen

    public abstract class AbstractKMeans<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
extends AbstractPrimitiveDistanceBasedAlgorithm<NumberVector<?,?>,D,Clustering<MeanModel<V>>>
    Abstract base class for k-means implementations.

      • assignToNearestCluster

        protected boolean assignToNearestCluster(Relation<V> relation,
                             List<Vector> means,
                             List<? extends ModifiableDBIDs> clusters)
        Returns a list of clusters. The kth cluster contains the ids of those FeatureVectors, that are nearest to the kth mean.
        Parameters:
        relation - the database to cluster
        means - a list of k means
        clusters - cluster assignment
        Returns:
        true when the object was reassigned
